vote.text: Amendment SA 1618 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1618 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3755-3756; text: CR S3755) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1618 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1618 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1463.
